name: MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor
desc: The minimum rasterization rates to apply to sections of a layer in the render target.

items.name: init(sampleCount: MTLSize)
items.desc: Initializes the layer map with an empty grid.

items.name: init(horizontal: [Float], vertical: [Float])
items.desc: Initializes a layer rate map with a set of horizontal and vertical rasterization rates.

items.name: var sampleCount: MTLSize
items.desc: The number of rows and columns in the layer map.

items.name: var maxSampleCount: MTLSize
items.desc: The maximum number of rows and columns in the layer map.

items.name: var horizontal: MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray
items.desc: The horizontal rasterization rates for the layer map’s rows.

items.name: var vertical: MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray
items.desc: The vertical rasterization rates for the layer map’s rows.

items.name: class MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray
items.desc: An array object that contains rasterization rates.
